## NoAuthGuard class

Used to guard for authorized users and redirect them to a return url provided as a query parameter in the route. Optionally redirects to default home route.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NoAuthGuard implements CanActivate 
```
<b>Implements:</b> CanActivate
